title: Amazon SQS partial batch response Lambda function
description: This snippet demonstrates how to handle an SQS event and implement a partial batch response in a lambda function.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The Lambda function retrieves a source SQS event which may contain messages that cannot be processed. As exceptions are caught processing messages, a list of itemIdentifiers is collected. The collection is returned as batchItemFailures, a JSON serialized list of itemIdentifiers. This sample assumes ReportBatchItemFailures is activated on your lambda function.
